text: mathal ma yunfiq alkafirun fi wujuh alkhayr fi hadhih alhayat aldunya wama yumilunah min thawabin, kamathal rih fiha bard shadid habbat ealaa zare qawm kanuu yarjun khayrahu, wabisabib dhunubihim lm tubq alriyh minh shyyana. wahula' alkafirun la yajidun fi alakhirat thwabana, wama zalamahum allah bidhalika, walakunahum zalamuu 'anfusahum bikufrihim waeusianihima
